name: The400 Mini
description:
Atari brings the computer age home. Again. Welcome back to the Atari 8 bit world of computing.
The powerful Atari 400 set a new standard of capability with its release in 1979, and along with its subsequent models, has been loved by gamers and computer enthusiasts for decades.
Now Retro Games and Atari have collaborated to create THE400 Mini. A half-sized version of the distinctively styled Atari 400, emulating the whole 8-bit Atari range from the 400 to the 800XL, and the Atari 5200 home console.
Also included is a recreation of the classic Atari CX40 joystick, with an additional seven seamlessly integrated function buttons.
Play one of the 25 built-in games, including: Lee, Berzerk, Millipede, Miner 2049er, M.U.L.E, Star Raiders II, and save your progress at any point in one of four save slots per game, or even pause and rewind gameplay to help you through the most difficult parts - a feature new to THE400 Mini.
The multi-region THE400 Mini features HD visuals output via HDMI and with five USB ports, you can connect additional controllers or a standard PC keyboard.
And as with all Retro Games releases you are free to play content you own via a USB flash drive, and learn to program in BASIC. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a newcomer to the world of retro computing, THE400 Mini has something to offer.

name: Danmaku Shimai: La soeur de barrage
description: La Soeur de Barrage is a freeware bullet game developed by Tocoroten featuring characters from the Maria-sama ga Miteru light novel series. Unique within the genre, the player controls their character using mouse input instead of a joystick or keyboard.

name: Flockland Island Crisis
description: An island runs from north to south in the center of the screen. Both sides of the island have to be defended from the enemy.

name: Hiden Inyou Kikouhou: Ca Da
description: Sin descripción

name: Words In Progress
description: Word crafting puzzle joy that never wears off! Combine letters to create words. Survive as long as you can in Endless mode, or play against others in Multiplayer!

name: Robo Rob
description: Robo Rob: Dive into this compact, rage-inducing puzzle adventure that's sure to test your patience and skill.

name: Sticky Struggles
description: Inspired by the classic Sokoban games, Sticky Struggles is a uniquely challenging puzzle game that will test your problem-solving skills and strategic thinking. With 50 levels of increasing difficulty, along with a set of bonus levels, Sticky Struggles will keep you entertained for hours.

name: Lineality
description: Are you sick of all those 3D games on the market? Try Lineality, the worlds first one dimensional action shooter game. Sounds low-tech? Not at all. Your one-dimensional battlefield can rotate in three dimensions as you play! A parody of any game that ever put technology ahead of playability!

name: HitagiDrops
description:
This is a game based on the character "Senjogahara Hitagi" from the "Monogatari" series.

Let's offer our love to Hitagi.

name: Numbershark 5
description:
Numbershark features over 50 games designed to give meaning to numbers and number operations.

Numbershark is used mostly by teachers in Primary schools. It is especially popular with SENCOs working with students who have dyscalculia or other special educational needs.

name: Conquela
description: Conquela is a multiplayer real-time strategy game where you collect resources, build structures and destroy your enemies.

name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare - Limited Collector's Edition
description:
Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare differs from previous installments of the Call of Duty series. Previous Call of Duty games have a distinct three country-specific campaign style, while Call of Duty 4 has a more film-like plot with interlaced story lines from the perspectives of Sgt. Paul Jackson of the Marines 1st Force Recon and Sgt. 'Soap' MacTavish of the British 22nd SAS Regiment.

This limited collector's edition includes:

- Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
- Bonus DVD with making-of scenes, a documentary of the British S.A.S., a level walk-through by the developer, and some campaign trailers. (Europe-only)
- Poster featuring the cover art of the game.
- Hardcover art book narrated by the developers and artists, with concept, development and final in-game artwork. (Xbox 360 & European Windows-only)
- Digital copy of the Brady Games official strategy guide (Windows-only)

name: Mousehole Bookshop
description: Anti-dating simulator about what's it like being an introvert. (Contains cat girls and puns)

name: Solomon's Key
description: The NES port of Solomon's Key, a puzzle game developed by Tecmo in 1986 for arcade on custom hardware based on the Z80 chipset. The game is generally recognized as one of the most difficult games to appear on the NES. The player, controlling a sorcerer known only as Dana must overcome unlimited enemy spawning, challenging level designs, a countdown timer, instant death from any physical contact with enemies, and limited ways to dispatch enemies.

name: Hugo: The Bewitched Rollercoaster
description: Sin descripción

name: Hugo and the Animals of the Ocean
description: Sin descripción

name: Nunchuck Charlie: A Love Story
description: It was just another afternoon in the Nunchuck-household when suddenly Mr.Teddington, Charlie's life-comrade and teddy bear, gets taken away from him! Fueled by love, sorrow and guilt Charlie embarks on a journey down the Wishingwell of Forbidden Wishes, battling his way through egg-hatched-security-guard-bears, flesh-eating-mullets and pigeon-laser-farts. A journey to test the toughest man's strength and intelligence. A journey that will uncover what might be best unknown.

name: Tag Team Wrestling
description:
You are challenged to match the awesome skills of your opponents...to gain the Title in the World Super Championships of TAG TEAM WRESTLING.

Teamwork and stamina are the keys, as you and your partner battle your way through the Title Matches on your quest for the Belt. Attack your opponents with Body Slams, Drop Kicks, Backbreakers, Flying Head Butts, or even throwing them out of the ring! To win, its a pin for a count of three. Nothing can match the super excitement as the crowd cheers over this mania on the mat. Prepare yourself for Tag Team Wrestling!

name: Honey Time! with Pooh!
description:
Pooh is no longer the cute little bear he used to be... something has corrupted him, and now he thirsts for blood. Gather your courage and investigate.

Play as Friend, Pooh's favorite human in the world. Not just anyone can taste Pooh's honey. Read the invitation he sent and then head to his house in the forest. When you enter his house, you'll discover that Pooh has changed a bit. But that's okay! Have a chat with Pooh; he has something to show you. Notice that Pooh's new honey is a bit too red for your liking. Try to escape by exploring Pooh's house while he's distracted. He'll attack you if he catches you trying to escape or snooping around his things. Bears are very territorial, you know?

name: Hugo: Heroes of the Savannah
description: Sin descripción

name: Hugo: Jungle Island 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Mike's Lonely Journey
description:
Having lost their parents in a plane crash, Mike and Lisa try to persevere through their broken childhood. The boy still wonders about the bottomless cave he was warned away from, though, and one day curiosity gets the better of him. Mike wanders into the darkness alone, seeking adventure and closure.

This action-platformer tasks players with solving each of 10 stages' puzzles and secrets to reach the end. It uses simple arcade-style controls and mechanics, akin to early-'80s classics such as Pitfall II and Tower of Druaga. Kill more creatures than required and you might get the "bad" ending; satisfy just each level's conditions to reach the "good" one and play the game's second loop. Mike's Lonely Journey saw release on the short-lived FM-77AV platform, with an FM-7 port having fewer levels and downgraded presentation. Oh! FM Magazine distributed and produced the game, while its developers soon moved on to companies like Namco and Tengen.

name: Zelda 64 1997
description: A fan recreation of the beta version of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time (back when it was known as Zelda 64). It aims to recreate and expand how the version would look like according to demo footage.

name: Critter Crosser
description: CROSSBREED ANYTHING! Combine monsters and have them fight in real time with their claws and teeth or even swords and shields. - From Steam

name: Ghostbane
description: GHOSTBANE is a game where you act as Paranormal Hunters. Your mission is to identify and neutralize various types of ghosts appearing in different locations. You can try your luck alone, but it's better to work in teams of 2-4 people. Solve this paranormal world using your equipment. Identify the types and beliefs of ghosts. By doing so, you can perform a ritual and trap them. Remember, teamwork and utilizing the strengths of each team member will shape your success. Are you ready, hunters?

name: XCOM: Enemy Unknown - Elite Soldier Pack
description:
Customize your squad with three new bonus items. Instantly unlock a new recruit in your barracks inspired by the original X-COM: UFO Defense. Outfit your soldiers with specialized armor upgrades including the new Hyperion and Reaper soldier armor kits. Customize your soldiers’ appearances with a variety of colors and tints for all armor sets.

Note: The Elite Soldier Pack was included in the pre-purchase offer of XCOM: Enemy Unknown.

name: Family Guy Bowling
description: Sin descripción

name: BS F-Zero Deluxe
description:
F-Zero was a launch title for the SNES, introducing the world to futuristic racing with the original 4 machines, 3 leagues, and 15 courses. In 1996-1997, Nintendo and St. Giga distributed F-Zero to their Super Famicom Satellaview subscribers with 2 multi-week, timed events. BS F-Zero Grand Prix contained 4 new machines and 19 courses, including 4 new courses across 4 remixed leagues. BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2 used only the 4 new machines and 4 new courses from BS F-Zero Grand Prix, along with 6 more new courses, for a total of 2 leagues. A downloadable companion game, BS F-Zero 2 Practice, allowed players to race on 5 of the new courses, and has been preserved. Sadly, no known copies of the 5 Forest and Metal Fort courses have ever been found.
BS F-Zero Deluxe combines all 3 games into a single package, with the 5 lost courses meticulously restored from recorded footage. Two new leagues have been named BS-1 and BS-2, and present the 10 new courses as they were in BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2. Choose from any of the 8 machines, and race on 25 courses across 5 leagues

name: Battle Gear
description: Rewrite history and conquer the world with either the USA, Russia or China.

name: Battle Gear 2
description: Take charge of military operations, enter enemy's territory from the air, sea and land, attack various parts of the world, battle for World Domination!

name: Battle Gear 3
description: The long awaited sequel to Battle Gear 2 is here! Get ready for the fight of your life! Battle Gear 3 takes the familiar formula from Battle Gear 2 and improves upon it by adding more units, more strategy, and a greater diversity of upgrades! The whole point of the game is to conquer the world one country at a time by carefully managing your troops! There are tons of upgrades and leveling up to do! How far can you get in this exciting strategy game? Good luck!

name: FL Tron
description:
FL Tron is an arcade game that combines aspects of the iconic snake game together with the iconic Tron movies and games. During each level you must control your very own Tron style snake and try to outwit your opponent and box them in - you must try and surround them and force them to crash!

Use the arrow keys to move your own snake and try to avoid hitting your own trail. Each match consists of 5 rounds and it is the first one to three rounds who wins. Don't forget to use your turbo boost if you need to suddenly dash by your opponent but remember to keep control! As you progress the levels become increasingly difficult and you must work hard to outplay your enemy!

name: Flash Cycle 2
description: Race for your life. The challenge is to cut off other competitors from the race and try to win. Leap over various obstacles and walls that will your opponents create. Do everything possible to come in perfect order to the finish and win the game. Can you handle it ?

name: Hot Air Bloon
description: Hot Air Bloon is an online flash game released by Ninja Kiwi in November 2008 that is currently available on the Flash Archive. It is a horizontal scroller where the player is tasked with navigating a monkey hanging from a damaged blimp through an ever-accelerating series of obstacles while popping as many bloons as possible.

name: Gururin World
description: A plug-and-play game released by EPOCH.

name: Super Dash Ball
description: A plug and play game released by Epoch in 2004.

name: MegaDrill
description:
“I’m gonna be rich!”
Upgrade that MegaDrill and dig down into the earth to salvage the treasures! You have 25 weeks to gather as much money as possible to buy the boat of your dream (maybe?) and go on a well earned vacation!

Tons of treasures, 12 trophies and 5 different endings based on your performances.
Play, upgrade and play again!

name: Build the Bridge
description: Physics game – build bridges so trains can get across safely.

name: Super Sized Mario Bros
description: A fan-made flash game of the first level of the original NES Super Mario bros game, except all of the characters are overweight.

name: Jelly Escape
description: Jelly Escape is an action-packed pixelated platformer with a classic retro look! Help your fellow jellies escape and maneuver your way through intricate levels to make it to the exit. Overcome treacherous obstacles, solve puzzles, beware of enemy blobs, and collect energy along the way to rescue all the jellies. How quickly can you Escape?

name: Johnny Upgrade
description: In Johnny Upgrade, players will have to do exactly what the title says - upgrade! Each round you are given a limited amount of time to travel around the map and collect coins. The round ends when either time runs out, or players run into a trap located somewhere on the map.

name: Icy Fishes
description: A fun chain reaction game with strategic system. Help the octopus to rescue fishes from ice floes to… eat them

name: Neon Race
description: In this car-racing game similar to Tron you'll drive a fast neon car and will have to crash into the red vehicles to destroy them. Avoid the purple ones and reach the goal in as little time as possible to unlock the next level and upgrade your car.

name: Neon Race 2
description: Race at super speeds through futuristic landscapes. More speed, more upgrades, more unlocks, more TURBO!

name: 300 Miles to Pigsland
description: Help these pigs escape from their farm and reach Pigsland safe and sound. Collect money on your way and purchase upgrades or new pigs.

name: Sticky Ninja Academy
description: Are you ready to enroll in the Sticky Ninja Academy? Do you think you can complete all of its courses, and have tons of fun becoming the next best ninja in it, graduate with top scores, and become a reputable hidden assassin in Japan? We hope so because that is the attitude you need to win this game and have fun with it, something we invite you to do right now!

name: Colony Defenders TD
description: In this game you'll have to protect your base against your enemies. Arrange your troops near the path and get rid of the waves of enemies.

name: Diamond Hollow
description: Shoot, upgrade, conquer enemies, attempt achievements, collect gems, all in an attempt to escape an endless cave

name: Diamond Hollow II
description: Shoot, explore, upgrade, conquer enemies, defeat bosses, acquire achievements, collect gems, all in an attempt to save yourself and your gun from the clutches of the evil Professor. The Sequel to the original Diamond Hollow game.

name: Army of Ages
description: You are at war and there will be 50 different units and tower you can use. The task is clear, defend your home base and destroy the enemy. In the game, you can move between different periods in which there will be newer and better weapons. Use your weapons and special attacks strategically and try to eliminate your opponent before he becomes a danger to you. How long can you survive in this excellent defense and upgrade game?

name: Who Made this Art? Human or AI
description: Will you be able to distinguish between real art and that created by an artificial intelligence?

name: Glorg
description: Glorg is a procedurally-generated dungeon crawler RPG developed by Grapefrukt and released on October 21, 2010. The main gimmick of this game is that you use only one button, the left mouse button, to do everything.

name: Together After Dark
description: Together After Dark is a co-op horror psychological game with a survival touch for 1-4 players. 4 Teens are stuck in the forest and need to find a way out but they are not alone

name: Guardian Rock
description: Using your rock destroy all the archaeologists. Your rock can be moved from left to right or top-down. without stopping.

name: The 4 Sins
description: The 4 Sins is a multiplayer puzzle game in horror atmosphere. It is adapted from a local offline escape room which has gained public recognition for its story. There are 4 players in the game to find cooperative solution by exploring the ghost town. Try to escape the strange place!

name: The Bustling World
description: The Bustling World is an open-world RPG set in ancient China. Delight in boundless freedom as you explore various features such as survival, cultivation, management, crafting, building, and exploration. Recruit your own army, establish a regime, and engage in diplomacy for an immersive experience.

name: Harry Potter Collection
description:
This compilation bundles 3 games in the Harry Potter series:
- Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
- Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
- Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

name: Is Anna OK?
description: Sin descripción

name: Ame no Tokyo Eki

Only once in my life did I truly fall in love I still remember when it rains The smell of rain, the noise of people, the sound of announcements It's just a few days of love.

Navigate a Tokyo train station as you search after a mysterious woman.

name: Infinite Shift
description: By Davide Di Bartolo (Crazy). The story starts where the original Blue-Shift ended: after having saved himself from Black-Mesa together with Rosenberg and the other 2 scientists, something goes wrong and Calhoun is teletransported in the alien dimension for a computer error.... yes I know, isn't very original.... but is just an excuse to put the hands again on the weapons!

name: Square Enix Masterpieces: Tomb Raider Bundle
description:
This compilation bundles 4 games in the Tomb Raider series:
- Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness
- Tomb Raider: Legend
- Tomb Raider: Underworld
- Tomb Raider: Anniversary

name: Brave Shot 2
description: Do you have what it takes to be the best? Brave Shot 2 pits you against the biggest guns, meanest mechs, and nastiest aliens ever to invade your mobile phone! With six intense levels and fast and furious shooting, Brave Shot 2 is a true test of your reflexes!

name: Blablaland
description: Blablaland is a 2D multiplayer chat game where you play a customizable avatar evolving in a colorful universe and an interactive environment that changes depending on the time of day and weather while offering a few mini-games.

name: JumpStart 1st Grade Reading
description:
JumpStart 1st Grade Reading, later released as JumpStart Reading for First Graders, is a game released in 1997 that focuses on teaching a first grade language arts curriculum.

Frankie's circus pals have been trapped in a magical jigsaw puzzle by mischievous Mel the Magician. The circus can't go on...or can it? Play exciting carnival games that build critical reading skills, then exchange your carnival tickets for pieces of the jigsaw puzzle. Reassemble the puzzle and save your circus friends before Mel casts a spell on you!

The 1997 releases of the game support both Windows and Macintosh computers, with later releases dropping Mac support. Both Focus Multimedia Ltd (United Kingdom) and SelectSoft Publishing (North America) handled the publishing for the re-release a decade later for the year 2007.

name: Architect of the Union
description: A tower defense RTS where you are in the middle of the army instead of just overlooking it. Based in an apocalyptic Soviet Union.

name: Mannequin Mayhem: Physics Ragdoll Shooter
description: Get ready for a wild ride in "Mannequin Mayhem," the craziest shooter this year! Say goodbye to zombies and aliens; it's time to blast creepy mannequins. Survive endless waves, customize your arsenal, and embrace the chaos. Let's laugh and blast our way through the weirdest enemies ever!

name: Stellar Blade: Digital Deluxe Edition

Edition includes:

name: Final Fantasy

A port of Final Fantasy for mobile devices, which features a re-translated script and an expanded inventory system, among other changes and fixes.

It released in North America in 2010, the same time a port of Final Fantasy 20th Anniversary Edition was released for iPhone and iTouch.

name: Megatouch Mobile Arcade

The popular touch panel Megatouch games, found in bars across the nation, are now available on your mobile phone!

Enjoy Q-shot, Box Drop, and 11 Up all in one application. These games, previously available only in bars, can now be played anytime and anywhere! Megatouch Mobile Arcade is only one part of the series, continue the fun with new chapters coming in the future!

name: 3D Space Invaders
description: Reborn using 3D polygon functions, that timeless classic can now be experienced from new camera perspectives with the press of a button. Set the perspective to first person and get ready for an exciting realistic invasion!

name: Chase H.Q. 3D
description: Originally developed for the arcades in 1988, Chase H.Q. was ported to various consoles such as the Amiga, the Atari ST, the Commodore 64, the Genesis, the Sega Master System, and the TurboGrafx-16. Today, you can enjoy Chase H.Q. on your mobile phone. Go undercover and pursue criminal suspects with the help of your operator, Nancy!

name: Elevator Action 3D
description:
Originally developed for the arcades in 1983, Elevator Action, has been ported to several consoles such as the Commodore 64, the Game Boy, the Game Boy Color, the NES, the Saturn, and the ZX Spectrum, where it has since enjoyed a large and loyal following.

Fans of the original and fans of the FPS genre will be pleased to find that classic Elevator Action has now been realized in 3D with crisp graphics, special tactical elements and fast-paced, FPS action.

name: Debasing Grounds
description: Debasing Grounds is an adult web-browser-based RPG and social simulator set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players can play it online or download the game. The game is compatible with various platforms, including Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android.

Featuring up to 7 iconic MK characters, perform key combos and finishing moves in up to 5 authentic arenas, backed by original sound effects and fist-pumping music. Dual control settings plus 3 difficulty levels deliver awesome action for hardcore and casual gamers alike. The ultimate in arcade kombat is back!

name: X-Blaster
description: In X-Blaster, as a pilot, you climb into so-called mechs to compete against each other in a 3D arena. At the beginning you had the choice between three different types of mech: Ranger (German: Forester), Defender (German: Defender) or Hunter (German: Jäger). Each 'Mech differed from the other two in its weapons and special abilities. When you first logged in, the selected 'Mech was initially located in a hangar, the "headquarters". Here new weapons for the mech could be purchased and existing ones could be improved.

name: Skybound: Card Survival
description: You're exiled to floating islands by the Gods, forced to entertain them forever. Stripped of your free will, you are cursed to act only through cards. Gather resources, battle monsters and survive the night. Explore the mysterious world and lead your character to triumph.

description:
According to Gamevial, Fly Like a Bird was originally produced as an experiment "built for the sake of curiosity". Having recently mastered walking characters and 3D animal models, Gamevial sought to go a step further and incorporate the concept of flight into their latest project.

Initially, the game lacked any other objective besides aimlessly flying around the city, and in order to keep the experience interesting, Gamevial added a feature known as a "poo-o-meter" – a concept that had been encouraged upon by outside sources. This idea would remain intact in the game's second and third releases.

name: Fly Like a Bird 2
description: Fly Like a Bird 2 is the successor to the original Fly Like a Bird game. This is the first installment in the series to introduce the MMO feature, in which players can chat and interact in virtual servers. The game was released in 2008.

name: Fly Like a Bird 3
description:
Fly Like a Bird 3 is the third game in the Fly Like a Bird series that made its debut it 2009.

The objective has remained generally the same. The player would fly around a chosen landscape and poop on objects, such as traffic wardens or other players. The player also had to avoid obstacles such as bins and powerlines.

name: Marselo: The Game
description: Marselo: The Game is a platformer based on killing enemies and getting into each level by getting the key to the next house

name: Pokémon Emerald Z
description: A hack of Pokémon Emerald that contains, among other things, over 100 Fakemon with thoughtful designs and high-quality sprites, a carefully-curated Pokédex, shuffled Gym Leaders, buffs to weak Pokémon, some new maps, and a lot of love.

name: Sítio do Picapau Amarelo: Geografia de Dona Benta
description: Geografia de Dona Benta tells the story of one of the adventures that took place at Sítio do Picapau Amarelo, in which the Marquês de Rabicó trips and goes flying through the sky on Emília's magic carpet. Through several games you can take part in a trip around the world, getting to know and learning the main characteristics of each country and city.

name: O Sítio do Picapau Amarelo: As Reinações de Narizinho
description: Children's game about the story "As Reinações de Narizinho" by the Brazilian writer Monteiro Lobato.

name: Why do you love me?
description: A short romantic novel about modern relationships. We took some situations from life and tried to answer the question "why do people love each other?".

name: Era uma vez um gato
description: Children's point click game!

name: As Aventuras de Hércules Vol. 2: A Hidra de Lerna
description: The adventures of Hercules volume 2 of 3, developed by Studio Interativo.

name: Sítio do Picapau Amarelo: As Novas Reinações de Narizinho
description: Game based on the story "Sítio do Picapau Amarelo: As Novas Reinações de Narizinho" by the Brazilian writer Monteiro Lobato.

name: Sítio do Picapau Amarelo: Emília e a Reforma da Natureza
description:
The Reforma da Natureza CD-ROM had as its theme a computer brought by the Viscount to Sítio de Dona Benta. Emília uses make-believe and the computer to carry out renovations in nature.

All the renovations that appear in the book appear in the game at some point: the edible book, the bird's nest, the renovation of the mocha cow, among others. The highlight is the games that Emília uses to undo the renovation.

name: Sítio do Picapau Amarelo: A Nova Aritmética da Emília
description: Game based on the story "A Nova Arithmética da Emília" by Brazilian writer Monteiro Lobato.

name: Discarnate: Locust
description: You are tasked by The Collector to find a painting that has been locked away in the depths of an abandoned house. The Collector does not care how you find it, he cares about results and confidentiality. DO NOT attract unwanted attention, DO NOT fail him. Good Luck.

name: Sítio do Picapau Amarelo: Caçadas de Pedrinho
description: In Caçadas de Pedrinho, players join Pedrinho, Narizinho, Emília, and other characters from Monteiro Lobato's Sítio do Picapau Amarelo in an adventure to hunt a jaguar that threatens the Sítio. The game features animated screens where players can explore the Sítio, forest, and its inhabitants, interacting with the story by reading, listening, and completing challenges. Activities include testing aim, solving mazes, challenging memory, coloring characters, assembling puzzles, and navigating mini-games with adjustable difficulty. With 256-color graphics and interactive elements, the game combines learning, action, and fun in a detailed, animated environment.

name: This Won't Make You Happy
description: Trek into the fearsome Caves of Despair in search of the Jewel of Happiness! Encounter grotesques and total weirdos! Collect all the shiny, shiny gems! All this and more in THIS WON'T MAKE YOU HAPPY——a sort of funny, sort of sentimental game by a real-life, non-fictitious comedy writer named Mike Gillis.

name: Wizened Dream
description: Withered Dream is a 2D story exploration game based on card stacking and limited-time operation. By modifying the stacking relationship between the cards, new cards can be generated and the story can be advanced. The game contains three stories: going to school, going to work, and being unemployed.

name: Sugar Jar
description: Sugar Jar' is a cosy, family-friendly game of merging confectionery delights. Perfect for all ages, combine sweets in a jar through colourful, evolving stages. Enjoy a relaxing, joyful experience filled with charming visuals. Begin your sweet merging adventure today!

name: Annapurna Interactive Deluxe Limited Edition Collection
description:
Since the release of What Remains of Edith Finch in 2017, Annapurna Interactive has rhythmically — game after game — nurtured visionary, creator-driven experiences.

Each title is wholly unique, yet when viewed from the macro, as a family of games, the impeccable curation and producorial pedigree of Annapurna becomes clear. We at iam8bit immensely appreciate what our friends at Annapurna have done to elevate gaming, so we partnered with them to produce this one-of-a-kind anthology.

Introducing the Annapurna Interactive Deluxe Limited Edition Collection — a first-of-its-kind release, featuring a whopping 12 games, neatly packed onto a single Switch cart. Just pop it in and watch each title, including 4 previously unreleased physical games, flood your dashboard.

This collection is more than just the games, though. In addition to the ultra premium packaging, we’ve also included a foreword from Annapurna Interactive founder, Nathan Gary, as well as an art booklet featuring exclusive statements from each game’s creative visionaries.

And because the legacy of Annapurna Interactive is so directly intertwined with the history of the Nintendo Switch, we knew this collection needed something extra special to bring it all together. That’s why we’ve included an Exclusive & Luxurious Annapurna Interactive Console & Cartridge Case. Prepare to feel safe, secure, and fashionable as you take your console on-the-go. You won’t find these anywhere else!

name: Path to Magehood
description: Embark on a Roguelite RPG Bullet Hell! Dare to challenge the depths of Rots Dungeon? Only the most wise and talented mages brave this perilous journey. New titles await those who prove their magical prowess. Navigate the dangers with caution and cunning. Good luck brave wizards!

name: Shrimp.io
description: A Shrimp Based Bullet Heaven. Kill creatures, Level up & pick from 3 upgrades to unalive thousands more.

name: Malignant Survivors
description: 3D rogue-like action game in a dark fantasy theme. Blow up thousands of malignants and find quality loot to improve your heroes for harder challenges.

name: HandyGames Deluxe Pack
description: A set of 3 unique games presented by Handy Games! Voice-operated puzzle action game "One Hand Clapping", side-scrolling action game "Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Ultimate Edition" in which you explore a world full of gimmicks, and cute cardboard puzzle "Pile Up! Box by Box". Can be enjoyed by children and adults alike. Let's go on a big adventure by operating pop characters on colorful stages!

name: Mr. Bill's Neighborhood
description: Mr. Bill's Neighborhood is a cancelled Atari 2600 game based on the Saturday Night Live character Mr. Bill.

name: Smokey Bear
description: Smokey Bear is a cancelled educational Atari 2600 game based on the character Smokey the Bear, an American advertising mascot by Ad Council.

name: Unknown Tank Game
description: Unknown Tank Game is an unofficial name given to an untitled tank game developed by JimsToy in the 1980s for the Atari 2600.

name: Whiteout Frontier
description: In this turn based, survival focused Tactical SRPG, you must defend locations from dynamic and intelligent enemy groups wishing to destroy the town for their own survival. Hang out and bond with your crew as you defend and save what you can as everything slips into chaos. Every choice matters.

name: My Melody & Kuromi no Machigai Sagashi
description: My Melody & Kuromi no Machigai Sagashi is a browser based game that was hosted on the Yahoo Japan website during a collaboration between Sanrio and Yahoo in 2012.

name: Temple of Causality
description: Embark on a transcendental journey in Temple of Causality, a captivating puzzle game that melds ancient wisdom with intricate mechanics. Push interconnected blocks and guide Azura through mystic environments, mastering the concept of causality to solve mind-bending puzzles

name: Neon Nova
description: Dive into the adrenaline-fueled world of Neon Nova, a cutting-edge Neon Arena Ship Shooter! Experience intense arena battles, unlock customizable ships with vibrant neon skins, and dominate diverse game modes. Are you ready to be the master of the neon universe? Jump in now!

name: Touhou Lensed Night Sky, Kaseigai
description: "I want you to go to the moon."

name: Veiled Skies
description: Veiled Skies is a "cloudpunk" jRPG that serves as a cornerstone for the Kuroverse, a series of games set in a vast world covering three skydoms. Takes heavy inspiration from Granblue Fantasy.

name: Bytebond
description: Bond with your friend and become a part of the Antivirus Special Forces as you head to the heart of the PC. Solve electrifying puzzles to regain control over the infected CPU.

name: Grym Wonder
description: Fight tirelessly in the world of the game Grym Wonder, created in the style of power-fantasy with rogue-lite elements, where you are one on one with thousands of monsters and their leaders.

name: Game Builder Tycoon
description: In Game Builder Tycoon, begin as an indie game developer. Personalize your character, craft hit games, manage marketing, research stuff and manage a skilled team. Overcome competition to guide your game development studio to global recognition and dominate the gaming industry.

name: Kary
description: Kary, an intriguing suspense game where you take on the role of a brave girl who finds herself alone and her house is being haunted by ghosts. Face your fears as you explore the dark rooms and hallways, where ghosts lurk in the shadows.

name: Timeworks
description: Timeworks is a time-traveling 3D puzzle platformer with a bouncy cartoon style. Work along past versions of yourself to solve puzzles, create unique Items, and fill out your quotas for your mysterious employers.

name: The Good Weapon
description:
The world is consumed by evil, leaving the three of you trapped inside your bunker. There's no way out other than to nuke the entire world.

Yet your leader's having second thoughts. She's getting cold feet; and if the two of you can't convince her to use the weapon, then maybe it's time to take matters into your own hands.

Are you ready to save the world?

name: The Tipping Point
description:
In The Tipping Point, you play as Cass, an arctic climate researcher. You must get off the ice sheet before it collapses. On your way, you will gather and analyze data about the ice.
The Tipping Point is a 3D side-scroller platformer, with about 2-3 hours of gameplay.

Make your way over the collapsing ice sheet by jumping, sliding, and climbing. Reach abandoned research stations and gather data in a series of mini-games. Analyze the data and uncover what is happening to the climate.

The Tipping Point is developed in collaboration with real world researchers in an interdisciplinary effort (physicists, biologists, chemists, statisticians, and more). The things you do in The Tipping Point are based on what researchers do in the arctic in real life.

As researchers do, you will compare the data you collect to previous data sets and investigate changes in the climate.

Solve the mystery of the tipping point and why the ice sheet is suddenly collapsing.

name: Arrowbound
description: Bound through a painterly pixel art world on a quest to recover your flock of woodland friends from the clutches of giant eagles! Don't give up, it's only a little higher!

name: Tiny Connections
description:
Tiny Connections unveils a gridded landscape filled with randomly appearing houses and resource buildings. Each house, distinguished by its color, requires a connection to a resource building of the same color. Your task is to draw connections – using pipes, power lines, or other conduits – to link these structures.

The real challenge lies in resource management. With limited connection parts, strategic thinking is key. Utilize special abilities like underground tunnels to extend your reach while conserving resources. Avoid crossing lines and manage the limited connection points on resource buildings to succeed.

name: Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits: Volume 1
description:
Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits: Volume 1 for Nintendo 64 contains the four Williams-produced games Defender, Joust, Robotron: 2084, and Sinistar plus the two extra games: Root Beer Tapper (Tapper) and Spy Hunter.

It was also released for Dreamcast with the games Bubbles and Defender II (Stargate) instead of Root Beer Tapper (Tapper) and Spy Hunter.

name: Capcom Coin-Op Classics Series 1
description: Capcom's Coin-op Collection Volume 1 is a compilation of 14 arcade games.

name: Catch Me
description: Catch Me is a game released built-in some models of televisions by the Philco company in the 90s. It is a memory game, in which the player has to remember the order and position of 4 symbols (the logo of the company), according to a sequence, while a timer counts down.

name: Gumrun
description: The goal of this jump 'n' run multiplayer racing game is to use the weapons and items in-game to achieve victory and collect the most coins. Those can be spent to unlock new skins and weapons for your next run. You can play online against up to 9 other players or compete with a bunch of your friends in a private session.

name: Starward Rogue + Moonshine Inc.: Galactic Spirit Deluxe Bundle
description: Get behind the controls of a mecha or craft moonshine - Starward Rogue + Moonshine Inc.

name: Starward Rogue + Moonshine Inc.: Galactic Spirit Bundle
description: Get behind the controls of a mecha or craft moonshine - Starward Rogue + Moonshine Inc.

name: Love FMV
description: Wales Interactive are proud to offer you Five Dates and Ten Dates all discounted in one bundle!

name: Bayonetta / Forza Motorsport 3
description:
Bayonetta/Forza Motorsport 3 is a compilation for the Xbox 360 containing Bayonetta and Forza Motorsport 3.

The compilation is very rare, only being released as part of a console bundle in Japan in 2010.

name: Last Epoch: Fallen Ronin
description: The Fallen Ronin armor set is a unique cosmetic armor set available to be equipped in Last Epoch

name: Last Epoch: Temporal Guardian
description: The Temporal Guardian armor set is a unique cosmetic armor set available to be equipped in Last Epoch and provides only a visual change.

name: Last Epoch: Firefly's Refuge
description: The Firefly's Refuge is a unique in-game portal effect that you can use to replace the visual look of your character's town portal!

name: Last Epoch: Celestial Way
description: Travel through time in style with the mysterious Celestial Way portal.

name: Last Epoch: Adult Chronowyrm
description: The Adult Chronowyrm is a fearsome partner to have join you on your quests through Last Epoch!

name: Projeto Real: Rabbit the Pet
description: Now with a cuddly friend! Get the "Bouncy Buddy" and have adorable company in your home.

name: Sudden Market: Free Cosmetic DLC
description: Give a fresh look to every security guard of Sudden Market with this free cosmetic DLC!

name: Otherworld Legends: Wu Fei
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Legends: Skin - Striker Dragoneer
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Legends: Skin - Sunclipse
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Legends: Huo YuFeng
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Real Anime Situation! 2
description: When chronic daydreamer Tooru’s dastardly diary is discovered, classmates old and new won’t give him a moment’s peace! Featuring eye-popping art, intricate animations, and multiple moonstruck heroines, this censored Steam release of the ’20 Moe Game Awards-winning comedy VN also received its own hit anime adaptation.

name: Countryside Life
description: Countryside Life Simulator is an extremely comprehensive and detailed simulation of the life of a rural farmer who owns a farm shop.

name: Knight's Saga Evil Goblins
description: Knight's Saga: Evil Goblins is an exciting fantasy game where the world has been invaded by evil goblins and you take on the role of a brave warrior on a dangerous journey to destroy them. Exciting adventures and battles await you in the name of saving the kingdom.

name: Hentai Bunny
description: Hentai Bunny is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.
